FuncDef: This command sets the Frame Relay interface into the DCE, DTE, or Bidirectional mode of LMI operation. The DTE mode causes the router to send status inquiries over the interface. The DCE mode causes the router to respond to status inquiries. In bidirectional mode, the router performs both DTE and DCE operation over the FR interface. The bidirectional mode applies to the ANSI and ITU LMI types only.

ParaDef.Info: Enables the bidirectional mode for LMI types ANSI and ITU.
